app.meta-title: EzStart - The Ultimate Boilerplate for Modern Web Development
app.meta-description: Jumpstart your web development projects with {meta-title}, a comprehensive and flexible boilerplate. Built with modern technologies and best practices, {meta-title} provides a robust foundation for creating high-performance, scalable web applications. Perfect for developers looking to streamline their workflow and enhance productivity.

hero.title: EZ Start
hero.description: EZ Start is my Boilerplate that provides a comprehensive and flexible starting point for your web development projects. Built with modern technologies and best practices, it helps you kickstart your development process with a robust foundation.

features.title: Cutting-Edge Stack
features.description: Leverage the power of Next.js 14 for building your applications. Ez-start employs TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Prisma ORM to provide a modern and efficient development environment. Stay ahead with the latest web technologies, best practices, and optimized SEO.

features.title: Secure Authentication
features.description: Implement secure authentication in your application using NextAuth.js. This allows for integration with various providers like Google and GitHub, ensuring flexible and secure user authentication and account management.

features.title: Global Reach with i18n
features.description: Expand your application's reach globally with Next-Intl for seamless localization. This setup enables you to manage translations effortlessly and cater to a diverse audience by breaking language barriers.

features.title: Efficient Database Management
features.description: Integrate with Prisma for simplified and efficient database management. Generate automatic migrations, access type-safe data, and ensure compatibility with PostgreSQL.

features.title: Rich Component Library
features.description: Utilize Radix UI components and Framer Motion for creating dynamic and accessible user interfaces. Build sophisticated and interactive UIs with ease, backed by a robust component library like ShadcnUI and Aceternity.

features.title: Developer-Centric Tools
features.description: Experience a streamlined development process with ESLint, Prettier, and TypeScript. Maintain high code quality and consistency with Tailwind CSS for styling and Prisma for database management.

get-started.title: Get Started
content: To get started with My EZ Start Boilerplate, clone the repository and follow the setup instructions in the README file. Customize the configuration files to suit your project needs, and start building your application with ease.
This boilerplate is designed to be flexible and extensible, allowing you to add features and modify existing ones to fit your specific requirements.

installation.title: Installation
installation.steps:
git clone https://github.com/DFranck/my-ez-start.git
cd my-ez-start
npm install

setup-env.title: Setup environment
setup-env.steps:
DATABASE_URL=`postgresql://username:password@localhost:5432/mydatabase` 
AUTH_URL=http://localhost:3000 
AUTH_SECRET=your_secret_key 
AUTH_SALT=your_salt 
GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID=YOUR_GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID 
GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET=YOUR_GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET 
GITHUB_CLIENT_ID=YOUR_GITHUB_CLIENT_ID 
GITHUB_CLIENT_SECRET=YOUR_GITHUB_CLIENT_SECRET 
MAILJET_API_SECRET=YOUR_MAILJET_API_SECRET 
MAILJET_API_KEY=YOUR_MAILJET_API_KEY

steps.name: DATABASE_URL
steps.description: The connection string for your PostgreSQL database. You can find this in your database service dashboard.

steps.name: AUTH_URL
steps.description: The base URL of your authentication service. Typically this is your application's URL.

steps.name: AUTH_SECRET
steps.description: A secret key for encrypting JWT tokens. Generate a random key using crypto or another method.

steps.name: AUTH_SALT
steps.description: A salt for hashing passwords. Generate a random salt using crypto or another method.

steps.name: GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID
steps.description: Your Google OAuth client ID. You can find this in the Google Developer Console.

steps.name: GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET
steps.description: Your Google OAuth client secret. You can find this in the Google Developer Console.

steps.name: GITHUB_CLIENT_ID
steps.description: Your GitHub OAuth client ID. You can find this in the GitHub Developer settings.

steps.name: GITHUB_CLIENT_SECRET
steps.description: Your GitHub OAuth client secret. You can find this in the GitHub Developer settings.

steps.name: MAILJET_API_SECRET
steps.description: Your Mailjet API secret key. You can find this in the Mailjet account settings.

steps.name: MAILJET_API_KEY
steps.description: Your Mailjet API key. You can find this in the Mailjet account settings.

features.title: Features
content: Automatic updates in critical files like package.json, README.md, and translation files.
Simple configuration to define the new application name and paths to be updated.
Robust handling of string replacements to ensure all instances of the old name are updated.
